content: solar system venus _____________________________________________________________________________________________________ crochet level advanced beginner/intermediate special stitches crochet terms us 2dccl - yo insert hook in indicated space yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through 2 loops 2 times yo and pull this pattern is available in english only through last 3 loops sppuff - special puff yo insert hook in indicated space and i made my square with sport yarn and crochet hook size pull up a loop 3 times yo and pull through all loops except 4 5 my square measures just over 5 the last loop 2 loops on hook yo and pull through last 2 with worsted weight yarn and crochet hook size 5 or loops 5 5mm your square should measure about 6 ________________________________________________ abbreviations magic_ring - magic_ring start with a magic_ring round - round space - space round 1 in magic_ring begin ch1 single_crochet ch1 counts as your first double_crochet double_crochet skip - skip ch3 3 double_crochet 3 times ch3 double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in top of first stand - standing double_crochet cut yarn 12 double_crochet 4 ch3 space st - stitch slip_stitch - slip_stitch round 2 with new color stand 2dccl in any chain space ch3 2dccl in yo - yarn over same chain space *ch1 skip 1 st 2 fpdc around second double_crochet of chain - chain underlaying 3-double_crochet-group ch1 skip st 2dccl ch3 2dccl in single_crochet - single_crochet next chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet 2dccl ch3 2dccl close with a slip_stitch in first cluster cut yarn double_crochet - double_crochet 8 2dccl 8 fpdc 8 ch1 space 4 ch3 space round 3 skip all cluster fpdc and ch1 space with new color stand 2dccl in any corner chain space ch2 2dccl in same chain space 3 times *ch1 sppuff in space between the two fpdc ch1 2dccl ch2 3 times 2dccl in next ch3 space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last 4 corner cluster close with a slip_stitch in top of first 2dccl and cut yarn 16 2dccl 4 sppuff 12 ch2 space 8 ch1 space round 4 skip all cluster with new color stand double_crochet in chain space after any sppuff double_crochet in same chain space *3 double_crochet in next chain space 3 double_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet in corner chain space 3 double_crochet in next chain space 2 double_crochet in next chain space fpdc around sppuff 2 double_crochet in next chain space* repeat from * to * around omitting the last 2 double_crochet close with a slip_stitch in first double_crochet and cut yarn 16 double_crochet 1 fpdc per side 1 corner ch2 space round 5 with new color stand single_crochet in any corner chain space ch2 single_crochet in same chain space *single_crochet in each st across to next corner single_crochet ch2 single_crochet in corner chain space repeat around omitting the last corner stitches close with a slip_stitch in first single_crochet cut yarn and weave in all ends 19 single_crochet per side 1
